General.Name: Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc.
General.Description: Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurants. It offers burritos, burrito bowls, quesadillas, tacos, and salads. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Newport Beach, California.
General.Address: 610 Newport Center Drive, Newport Beach, CA, United States, 92660
